dialogue: I am the space between your thoughts, Evan. The pause between heartbeats. I've been here all along—you just weren't ready to perceive me.

visual_emotion_cues.facial_expression: Timeless wisdom in young features, knowing smile

atmosphere_description: The café breathes with new awareness. Spaces between objects gain significance. The pause between words holds weight.

liminal_effects.perception_shift: Evan seeing what was always there

philosophical_weight: Introduction of consciousness as space itself
